title: Vista ShadowCopy forgives unwise edits
text:
Vista Tips 'Shadow Copy' If you start editing a document and then, after making numerous changes and saving the changes, you realise you shouldn't have made the changes in the first place, ShadowCopy might save the day. In this video we demonstrate how to access a "backup" version of the file that was created by Vista.
